reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Edit - Reveal contained item(s) from selected Superitem previously glued by Superglue. Use MB_Superglue Glue to save changes & propagate to Sibling items in same Pool.lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue - Edit selected Superitem reversibly

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Glue - Nondestructively glue selected item(s) into Superitem. Use 'Edit' later to reveal contained items & make changes.lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue - Glue selected item(s) reversibly into pooled container item, ignoring time selection

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Options - Display - Background images on new Superglue items - Superitems diagonal, contained items horizontal stripes (On-Off).lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue - Toggle option, item background images

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Options - Display - Randomly color newly Superglued Superitem (On-Off).lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue - Set new Superitem glue to random color

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Options - Global - Open script options window.lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue - Open script options window

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Options - Glue - Auto-increase channel count with take FX (On-Off).lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue - Auto-increase channel count with take FX on Reglue

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Options - Glue - Time selection (not sizing region) determines Superitem edges (On-Off).lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue - Time selection determines Superitem edges

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Options - Reglue - Absolute or relative length change on Siblings if length propagation enabled (can still be altered by playrate) (Absolute-Ask-Relative).lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue - Options - Reglue - Absolute or relative length change on Siblings if length propagation enabled (can still be altered by playrate) (Absolute/Ask/Relative)

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Options - Reglue - Audio source position of Siblings is maintained (Enable-Ask-Disable).lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue - Maintain siblings' audio source position

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Options - Reglue - Length change of Edited Superitem propagates to Siblings (Enable-Ask-Disable).lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue - Cycle option, Propagate Superitem length change to siblings

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Options - Reglue - Playrate of Siblings affects their length & position propagation values (Enable-Ask-Disable).lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue - Cycle option, Take playrate affects Superitem sibling propagation

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Options - Reglue - Position change of Edited Superitem's left edge propagates to Siblings (Enable-Ask-Disable).lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue - Cycle option, Propagate left edge position change to siblings

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Options - Reglue - Remove Siblings from Edited Superitem's Pool, giving every Sibling its own new Pool (On-Off).lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue - Toggle option, item background images

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Pool - Remove selected Superitem from current Pool & create new Pool for it.lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue - DePool superglued container item

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Smart Action - Glue or Edit selected item(s) by context.lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue Smart Action - Glue or Edit selected item(s) reversibly by context

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Smart Action - Glue or Unglue selected item(s) by context.lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue Smart Action - Glue or Unglue selected item(s) by context

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Unglue - Reveal contained item(s) from selected Superitem & detach from Pool. Use this instead of 'Edit' if you don't want your changes to propagate on reglue.lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue - Unglue selected Superitem back to contained items irreversibly

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Utility - Display selected Superglue item info - Pool no., No. of contained items, Parent Pool, etc.lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue - Display selected Superglue item info

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Utility - Dump Superglue project data to log.lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue - Display Superglue project data

reapack.name: MB_Superglue - Utility - Set all Superitems in project to one custom color.lua
MB_Superglue-Utils.lua
reapack.desc: MB_Superglue-Utils: Codebase for MB_Superglue scripts' functionality

version.author: MonkeyBars
version.changelog: Rename item breaks Glue-Reversible [9] (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/3); Don't store original item state in item name (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/73); Open container item is poor UX (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/75); Update code for item state from faststrings to Reaper state chunks (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/89); Refactor nomenclature (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/115); Replace os.time() for id string with GenGUID() (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/109); Change SNM_GetSetObjectState to state chunk functions (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/120); Switch take data number to item data take GUID (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/121); Refactor: Bundle up related variables into tables (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/129); Abstract out (de)serialization (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/132); Remove extra loop in adjustRestoredItems() (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/134); Use serialization lib for dependencies storage (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/135); Extrapolate deserialized data handling (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/137); Refactor nested pool update functions (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/139); Correct parent container pool update offset logic (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/142); Regluing container with previously removed item throws recursion msg (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/145); Rearchitect parent position propagation (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/146); Change action nomenclature (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/148); Check that parents exist before attempting restore+reglue (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/150); Empty spacing item breaks in item replace modes (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/151); Disallow multiple edit completely (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/152); Reglue after parent deletion throws error (still looks for it) (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/153); Move dev functions to external file (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/160); Deleted parents still get glued on temp tracks (https://github.com/MonkeyBars3k/ReaScripts/issues/161)
